component.name: Image
component.file: Image.swf (compiled component, needed for publication on internet)
Image.xml (configurationfile, needed for publication on internet)
component.description: Image component for loading png's, jpg's or swf's.

configtag.name: <fmc:Image>
<fmc:Image>

attribute.name: vstretch
vstretch
attribute.description: (defaultvalue = "true") True or false. Stretches the image vertical to the availible space.

attribute.name: hstretch
hstretch
attribute.description: (defaultvalue = "true") True or false. Stretches the image horizontal to the availible space.

attribute.name: scale9
scale9
attribute.description: A comma seperated list of four numbers. e.g. scale9="10,10,10,10" Defines the scale behaviour of the image.

configtag.hierarchy: childnode of <flamingo> or a container component. e.g. <fmc:Window>
configtag.description: This tag defines a image component.
